summary: Comprehensive frontend testing of Angular ERP dashboard 'FG Stock & Dispatch Optimizer â€“ Kalsofte Intelligence' completed successfully. All 13 specified features tested and working correctly including dashboard loading, KPI cards, Chart.js integration, data grids, AI insights panel, and responsive layout.
passed_tests: Dashboard loads correctly at public URL
Header component with logo, title, and date filters rendered
All 6 KPI cards displayed with correct data and trends
Line chart (Stock vs Dispatch Trend) renders with Chart.js and interactive tooltips
Bar chart (Stock Ageing Distribution) renders with Chart.js
Pending Orders data grid shows order data with status badges
FG Stock Ageing data grid displays properly with status indicators
Non-Moving Items table shows stagnant stock data
Fast-Moving Items table displays correctly with status indicators
AI Insights panel shows 6 insight cards with proper icons and timestamps
Date filter Apply button is clickable and functional
Responsive layout works at tablet width (1024px)
All interactive elements properly accessible with data-testid attributes
